name: A GIANT UNICORN DANCING FOR JOY
description:
a video clip from a work in progress version of my XR work: The Creative Unicorn's manifesto: https://gallery.styly.cc/scene/ce9d600b-c8d0-48ea-bfd1-fef268123200

This Unicorn dances with Shakespearean frivolity, its mind alight with glorious ideas. There will only be 10 of these minted. All the voice acting done by ME :D
